name: Silk Touch MedSpa

description: Provides microdermabrasion to exfoliate the top layer of dead skin cells, helpful for acne, mild pigmentation, and restoring a youthful glow. They utilize the Ultrapeel® II system

description: Offers microdermabrasion to rejuvenate skin, revealing a brighter and smoother complexion, and reducing the appearance of fine lines, acne scars, and uneven skin tone. They use diamond microdermabrasion

name: Idaho Skin Center
